#summary JMaximizableTabbedPane

= Introduction =

It is a JTabbedPane that supports "close button" and "maximum button" for each tab.

[http://petersoft-java-style-2.googlecode.com/files/JMaximizableTabbedPane20100118.png]


= Usage =

Step 1) Create a JMaximizableTabbedPane_BasePanel object and add it to the bottom
Step 2) Then you can create many JMaximizableTabbedPane on top of JMaximizableTabbedPane_BasePanel
